comment: Smart Data Models - PssIEEE1A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/PssIEEE1A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type PSS1A power system stabilizer model. PSS1A is the generalized form of a PSS with a single input. Some common stabilizer input signals are speed, frequency, and power.  Reference: IEEE 1A 421.5-2005 Section 8.1.

contents.name: a1
contents.comment: PSS signal conditioning frequency filter constant (A1).  Typical Value = 0.061. Default: 0.0

contents.name: a2
contents.comment: PSS signal conditioning frequency filter constant (A2).  Typical Value = 0.0017. Default: 0.0

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: inputSignalType
contents.comment: Type of input signal.  Typical Value = rotorAngularFrequencyDeviation. Default: None

contents.name: ks
contents.comment: Stabilizer gain (Ks).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t1
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

contents.name: t2
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T2).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0

contents.name: t3
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T3).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

contents.name: t4
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T4).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0

contents.name: t5
contents.comment: Washout time constant (T5).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

contents.name: t6
contents.comment: Transducer time constant (T6).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum stabilizer output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum stabilizer output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
